resources.string: Please ensure that you have turned off notifications for the SMS reception.This application will take care of this for you.Please tap on About Application for more help or select configure block option to proceed forward and start blocking.
This application provides facility to add numbers to blocked list either manually or from your phone contacts.Please select from where you want to add the contacts.
These are the details from Contacts.Please select the number which you want to block.
Please select block option from Home Screen.
Please select if you want to block Calls or SMS from this number.
Request Current Contact to be BlackListed
CALL BLACKLIST :-This will completely blackout any call from this number.No call or notification will be generated.
CALL BUSY :-If this option is checked,such calls will only be blocked if the phone is in BUSY mode.Such event will generate a notification.
CALL SignalLow :-If this option is checked,calls from this number will be blocked only if the GSM signal is very low.
CALL Battery Low :-If this optin is checked, calls from this number will be blocked only if battery is very low
SMS BLACKLIST :- This will completely blockout the SMS from a perticular number.The SMS neither come in the inbox nor any notification will be generated from this numbers SMS.
SMS Notify But Donot Save :-This will only generate a notification whenever a sMS is received from a particular number.WARNING!! The SMS will not be saved in the inbox if this is checked.
SMS Save But Donot Notify :-This will directly save the SMS to the inbox wthout generating a notification for the SMS.
